title: Loop, a logistics payments startup that matches shipping invoices to pricing, raised $30M across a seed and a Series A from Founders Fund, Flexport, and others (Jack Daleo/FreightWaves)
description:
Jack Daleo / FreightWaves:
Loop, a logistics payments startup that matches shipping invoices to pricing, raised $30M across a seed and a Series A from Founders Fund, Flexport, and others  —  Company handled $1B in payment volume in its 1st year … Here's a wild stat: Between 20% and 30% of all invoices today contain some form of exception or error.
